data.title: National Theatre Streaming
data.text:
National Theatre at Home

What’s streaming on National Theatre at Home? An exclusive collection of unforgettable British theatre for you to watch any time, anywhere.

A full list of Audio Described titles is available here.

Plus more titles are added each month.

National Theatre at Home is available worldwide and can be watched on any internet-connected device through your web browser, or on the National Theatre at Home app via iOS, Android, Amazon Fire or Roku TV.

You can choose to subscribe by the month, year or just rent a single play.

Please note titles are subject to change so check the platform for live listings.
